update.foreach: INTO TB_PLAN_INFO ( COMP_CD, PLAN_DT, ITEM_CD, PLAN_QTY, ORDER_QTY, REG_USER_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{compCd},#{item.planDt}, #{item.itemCd}, #{item.planQty} , #{item.orderQty}, #{userId}, SYSDATE )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT B.COMP_CD, A.ITEM_CD, SUM(A.PLAN_QTY) FROM TB_PLAN_INFO A, TB_PARTNER_INFO B WHERE A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD AND TO_CHAR(A.PLAN_DT, 'YYYY') = #{mkPlanYear} AND TO_CHAR(A.PLAN_DT, 'MM') = #{mkPlanMonth} GROUP BY B.COMP_CD, A.ITEM_CD )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.ITEM_NAME, SUM(A.PLAN_QTY) FROM TB_PLAN_INFO A, TB_ITEM_INFO B WHERE A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.PLAN_QTY > 0 AND TO_CHAR(A.PLAN_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') > #{palnDtFrom} AND TO_CHAR(A.PLAN_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{palnDtTo}
AND A.ITEM_CD LIKE '%'||#{itemCd}||'%'
AND A.COMP_CD LIKE '%'||#{compCd}||'%'
GROUP BY A.ITEM_CD, B.ITEM_NAME )
SELECT A.ITEM_CD, B.ITEM_NAME FROM TB_PARTNER_ITEM A, TB_ITEM_INFO B WHERE A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD AND A.COMP_CD = #{compCd} ORDER BY A.ITEM_CD

SELECT A.ITEM_CD, C.ITEM_NAME, B.ORDER_QTY, B.PLAN_QTY, (TO_CHAR(B.PLAN_DT,'DD'))PLAN_DT FROM TB_PARTNER_ITEM A, (SELECT * FROM TB_PRODUCT_INFO WHERE PLAN_DT LIKE '%'||#{planDt}||'%')B, TB_ITEM_INFO C WHERE A.COMP_CD = #{compCd} AND A.COMP_CD = B.COMP_CD(+) AND A.ITEM_CD = B.ITEM_CD(+) AND A.ITEM_CD = C.ITEM_CD
and A.ITEM_CD like '%'||#{itemCd}||'%'
ORDER BY B.PLAN_DT
